Flow.description: To track changes to Email Groups and log the change in the Email Group Changes field

formulas.name: FR_EG_AnyChanged_WF1
formulas.expression: OR( TEXT($Record.Email_Group_Awards_CDE__c) <> TEXT($Record__Prior.Email_Group_Awards_CDE__c), TEXT($Record.Email_Group_Awards_CDG__c) <> TEXT($Record__Prior.Email_Group_Awards_CDG__c), TEXT($Record.Email_Group_Awards_GOV__c) <> TEXT($Record__Prior.Email_Group_Awards_GOV__c), TEXT($Record.Email_Group_Circ_CDE_Digital_Ed__c) <> TEXT($Record__Prior.Email_Group_Circ_CDE_Digital_Ed__c), TEXT($Record.Email_Group_Circ_CDE_Renewal__c) <> TEXT($Record__Prior.Email_Group_Circ_CDE_Renewal__c), TEXT($Record.Email_Group_Circ_GOV_Digital_Ed__c) <> TEXT($Record__Prior.Email_Group_Circ_GOV_Digital_Ed__c), TEXT($Record.Email_Group_Circ_GOV_Renewal__c) <> TEXT($Record__Prior.Email_Group_Circ_GOV_Renewal__c), TEXT($Record.Email_Group_Circ_GT_Digital_Ed__c) <> TEXT($Record__Prior.Email_Group_Circ_GT_Digital_Ed__c), TEXT($Record.Email_Group_Circ_GT_Renewal__c) <> TEXT($Record__Prior.Email_Group_Circ_GT_Renewal__c), TEXT($Record.Email_Group_Events_CDE__c) <> TEXT($Record__Prior.Email_Group_Events_CDE__c), TEXT($Record.Email_Group_Events_CDG__c) <> TEXT($Record__Prior.Email_Group_Events_CDG__c), TEXT($Record.Email_Group_Events_EE__c) <> TEXT($Record__Prior.Email_Group_Events_EE__c), TEXT($Record.Email_Group_Events_EM__c) <> TEXT($Record__Prior.Email_Group_Events_EM__c), TEXT($Record.Email_Group_Events_GOV__c) <> TEXT($Record__Prior.Email_Group_Events_GOV__c), TEXT($Record.Email_Group_Events_GT__c) <> TEXT($Record__Prior.Email_Group_Events_GT__c), TEXT($Record.Email_Group_Events_TW__c) <> TEXT($Record__Prior.Email_Group_Events_TW__c), TEXT($Record.Email_Group_News_CDE_HED__c) <> TEXT($Record__Prior.Email_Group_News_CDE_HED__c), TEXT($Record.Email_Group_News_CDE_K_12__c) <> TEXT($Record__Prior.Email_Group_News_CDE_K_12__c), TEXT($Record.Email_Group_News_GOV_GOV_Daily__c) <> TEXT($Record__Prior.Email_Group_News_GOV_GOV_Daily__c) )

formulas.name: FR_EG_AnyChanged_WF2
formulas.expression: OR( TEXT($Record.Email_Group_News_GT_DC__c) <> TEXT($Record__Prior.Email_Group_News_GT_DC__c), TEXT($Record.Email_Group_News_GT_EM_News__c) <> TEXT($Record__Prior.Email_Group_News_GT_EM_News__c), TEXT($Record.Email_Group_News_GT_GovTech_Daily__c) <> TEXT($Record__Prior.Email_Group_News_GT_GovTech_Daily__c), TEXT($Record.Email_Group_news_NAV_Member__c) <> TEXT($Record__Prior.Email_Group_news_NAV_Member__c), TEXT($Record.Email_Group_News_NAV_Nav_Blast__c) <> TEXT($Record__Prior.Email_Group_News_NAV_Nav_Blast__c), TEXT($Record.Email_Group_News_NAV_Navigator__c) <> TEXT($Record__Prior.Email_Group_News_NAV_Navigator__c), TEXT($Record.Email_Group_Papers_CDE__c) <> TEXT($Record__Prior.Email_Group_Papers_CDE__c), TEXT($Record.Email_Group_Papers_EM__c) <> TEXT($Record__Prior.Email_Group_Papers_EM__c), TEXT($Record.Email_Group_Papers_GOV__c) <> TEXT($Record__Prior.Email_Group_Papers_GOV__c), TEXT($Record.Email_Group_Papers_GT__c) <> TEXT($Record__Prior.Email_Group_Papers_GT__c), TEXT($Record.Email_Group_Promo_CDE__c) <> TEXT($Record__Prior.Email_Group_Promo_CDE__c), TEXT($Record.Email_Group_Promo_EM__c) <> TEXT($Record__Prior.Email_Group_Promo_EM__c), TEXT($Record.Email_Group_Promo_GOV__c) <> TEXT($Record__Prior.Email_Group_Promo_GOV__c), TEXT($Record.Email_Group_Promo_GT__c) <> TEXT($Record__Prior.Email_Group_Promo_GT__c), TEXT($Record.Email_Group_Promo_Partner_Opt_In__c) <> TEXT($Record__Prior.Email_Group_Promo_Partner_Opt_In__c) )

formulas.name: FR_EG_AnyChanged_WF3
formulas.expression:
OR( TEXT($Record.Email_Group_Promo_TW__c) <> TEXT($Record__Prior.Email_Group_Promo_TW__c), TEXT($Record.Email_Group_Surveys_GT__c) <> TEXT($Record__Prior.Email_Group_Surveys_GT__c),
TEXT($Record.Email_Group_News_CDE_Market_Insight__c) <> TEXT($Record__Prior.Email_Group_News_CDE_Market_Insight__c), TEXT($Record.Email_Group_News_GOV_Market_Insight__c) <> TEXT($Record__Prior.Email_Group_News_GOV_Market_Insight__c), TEXT($Record.Email_Group_News_GT_Market_Insight__c) <> TEXT($Record__Prior.Email_Group_News_GT_Market_Insight__c), TEXT($Record.Email_Group_News_ER_SLED__c) <> TEXT($Record__Prior.Email_Group_News_ER_SLED__c),
TEXT($Record.Email_Group_News_GT_Biz__c) <> TEXT($Record__Prior.Email_Group_News_GT_Biz__c),
TEXT($Record.Email_Group_Awards_Digital_Counties__c) <> TEXT($Record__Prior.Email_Group_Awards_Digital_Counties__c), TEXT($Record.Email_Group_Awards_Digital_Cities__c) <> TEXT($Record__Prior.Email_Group_Awards_Digital_Cities__c), TEXT($Record.Email_Group_Awards_Govt_Exp__c) <> TEXT($Record__Prior.Email_Group_Awards_Govt_Exp__c), TEXT($Record.Email_Group_Awards_Best_of__c) <> TEXT($Record__Prior.Email_Group_Awards_Best_of__c),
TEXT($Record.Email_Group_News_GT_AI__c) <> TEXT($Record__Prior.Email_Group_News_GT_AI__c), TEXT($Record.Email_Group_News_GT_Cybersecurity__c) <> TEXT($Record__Prior.Email_Group_News_GT_Cybersecurity__c),
/* Checkbox: no TEXT() */ $Record.HasOptedOutOfEmail <> $Record__Prior.HasOptedOutOfEmail )

formulas.name: FR_EG_ChangesText_WF1
formulas.expression: IF(TEXT($Record.Email_Group_Awards_CDE__c) <> TEXT($Record__Prior.Email_Group_Awards_CDE__c), "Awards_CDE changed to '" & TEXT($Record.Email_Group_Awards_CDE__c) & "'." & BR(), "" ) & IF(TEXT($Record.Email_Group_Awards_CDG__c) <> TEXT($Record__Prior.Email_Group_Awards_CDG__c), "Awards_CDG changed to '" & TEXT($Record.Email_Group_Awards_CDG__c) & "'." & BR(), "" ) & IF(TEXT($Record.Email_Group_Awards_GOV__c) <> TEXT($Record__Prior.Email_Group_Awards_GOV__c), "Awards_GOV changed to '" & TEXT($Record.Email_Group_Awards_GOV__c) & "'." & BR(), "" ) & IF(TEXT($Record.Email_Group_Circ_CDE_Digital_Ed__c) <> TEXT($Record__Prior.Email_Group_Circ_CDE_Digital_Ed__c), "Circ_CDE_Digital_Ed changed to '" & TEXT($Record.Email_Group_Circ_CDE_Digital_Ed__c) & "'." & BR(), "" ) & IF(TEXT($Record.Email_Group_Circ_CDE_Renewal__c) <> TEXT($Record__Prior.Email_Group_Circ_CDE_Renewal__c), "Circ_CDE_Renewal changed to '" & TEXT($Record.Email_Group_Circ_CDE_Renewal__c) & "'." & BR(), "" ) & IF(TEXT($Record.Email_Group_Circ_GOV_Digital_Ed__c) <> TEXT($Record__Prior.Email_Group_Circ_GOV_Digital_Ed__c), "Circ_GOV_Digital_Ed changed to '" & TEXT($Record.Email_Group_Circ_GOV_Digital_Ed__c) & "'." & BR(), "" ) & IF(TEXT($Record.Email_Group_Circ_GOV_Renewal__c) <> TEXT($Record__Prior.Email_Group_Circ_GOV_Renewal__c), "Circ_GOV_Renewal changed to '" & TEXT($Record.Email_Group_Circ_GOV_Renewal__c) & "'." & BR(), "" ) & IF(TEXT($Record.Email_Group_Circ_GT_Digital_Ed__c) <> TEXT($Record__Prior.Email_Group_Circ_GT_Digital_Ed__c), "Circ_GT_Digital_Ed changed to '" & TEXT($Record.Email_Group_Circ_GT_Digital_Ed__c) & "'." & BR(), "" ) & IF(TEXT($Record.Email_Group_Circ_GT_Renewal__c) <> TEXT($Record__Prior.Email_Group_Circ_GT_Renewal__c), "Circ_GT_Renewal changed to '" & TEXT($Record.Email_Group_Circ_GT_Renewal__c) & "'." & BR(), "" ) & IF(TEXT($Record.Email_Group_Events_CDE__c) <> TEXT($Record__Prior.Email_Group_Events_CDE__c), "Events_CDE changed to '" & TEXT($Record.Email_Group_Events_CDE__c) & "'." & BR(), "" ) & IF(TEXT($Record.Email_Group_Events_CDG__c) <> TEXT($Record__Prior.Email_Group_Events_CDG__c), "Events_CDG changed to '" & TEXT($Record.Email_Group_Events_CDG__c) & "'." & BR(), "" ) & IF(TEXT($Record.Email_Group_Events_EE__c) <> TEXT($Record__Prior.Email_Group_Events_EE__c), "Events_EE changed to '" & TEXT($Record.Email_Group_Events_EE__c) & "'." & BR(), "" ) & IF(TEXT($Record.Email_Group_Events_EM__c) <> TEXT($Record__Prior.Email_Group_Events_EM__c), "Events_EM changed to '" & TEXT($Record.Email_Group_Events_EM__c) & "'." & BR(), "" ) & IF(TEXT($Record.Email_Group_Events_GOV__c) <> TEXT($Record__Prior.Email_Group_Events_GOV__c), "Events_GOV changed to '" & TEXT($Record.Email_Group_Events_GOV__c) & "'." & BR(), "" ) & IF(TEXT($Record.Email_Group_Events_GT__c) <> TEXT($Record__Prior.Email_Group_Events_GT__c), "Events_GT changed to '" & TEXT($Record.Email_Group_Events_GT__c) & "'." & BR(), "" ) & IF(TEXT($Record.Email_Group_Events_TW__c) <> TEXT($Record__Prior.Email_Group_Events_TW__c), "Events_TW changed to '" & TEXT($Record.Email_Group_Events_TW__c) & "'." & BR(), "" ) & IF(TEXT($Record.Email_Group_News_CDE_HED__c) <> TEXT($Record__Prior.Email_Group_News_CDE_HED__c), "News_CDE_HED changed to '" & TEXT($Record.Email_Group_News_CDE_HED__c) & "'." & BR(), "" ) & IF(TEXT($Record.Email_Group_News_CDE_K_12__c) <> TEXT($Record__Prior.Email_Group_News_CDE_K_12__c), "News_CDE_K_12 changed to '" & TEXT($Record.Email_Group_News_CDE_K_12__c) & "'." & BR(), "" ) & IF(TEXT($Record.Email_Group_News_GOV_GOV_Daily__c) <> TEXT($Record__Prior.Email_Group_News_GOV_GOV_Daily__c), "News_GOV_GOV_Daily changed to '" & TEXT($Record.Email_Group_News_GOV_GOV_Daily__c) & "'." & BR(), "" )

formulas.name: FR_EG_ChangesText_WF2
formulas.expression: IF(TEXT($Record.Email_Group_News_GT_DC__c) <> TEXT($Record__Prior.Email_Group_News_GT_DC__c), "News_GT_DC changed to '" & TEXT($Record.Email_Group_News_GT_DC__c) & "'." & BR(), "" ) & IF(TEXT($Record.Email_Group_News_GT_EM_News__c) <> TEXT($Record__Prior.Email_Group_News_GT_EM_News__c), "News_GT_EM_News changed to '" & TEXT($Record.Email_Group_News_GT_EM_News__c) & "'." & BR(), "" ) & IF(TEXT($Record.Email_Group_News_GT_GovTech_Daily__c) <> TEXT($Record__Prior.Email_Group_News_GT_GovTech_Daily__c), "News_GT_GovTech_Daily changed to '" & TEXT($Record.Email_Group_News_GT_GovTech_Daily__c) & "'." & BR(), "" ) & IF(TEXT($Record.Email_Group_news_NAV_Member__c) <> TEXT($Record__Prior.Email_Group_news_NAV_Member__c), "News_NAV_Member changed to '" & TEXT($Record.Email_Group_news_NAV_Member__c) & "'." & BR(), "" ) & IF(TEXT($Record.Email_Group_News_NAV_Nav_Blast__c) <> TEXT($Record__Prior.Email_Group_News_NAV_Nav_Blast__c), "News_NAV_Nav_Blast changed to '" & TEXT($Record.Email_Group_News_NAV_Nav_Blast__c) & "'." & BR(), "" ) & IF(TEXT($Record.Email_Group_News_NAV_Navigator__c) <> TEXT($Record__Prior.Email_Group_News_NAV_Navigator__c), "News_NAV_Navigator changed to '" & TEXT($Record.Email_Group_News_NAV_Navigator__c) & "'." & BR(), "" ) & IF(TEXT($Record.Email_Group_Papers_CDE__c) <> TEXT($Record__Prior.Email_Group_Papers_CDE__c), "Papers_CDE changed to '" & TEXT($Record.Email_Group_Papers_CDE__c) & "'." & BR(), "" ) & IF(TEXT($Record.Email_Group_Papers_EM__c) <> TEXT($Record__Prior.Email_Group_Papers_EM__c), "Papers_EM changed to '" & TEXT($Record.Email_Group_Papers_EM__c) & "'." & BR(), "" ) & IF(TEXT($Record.Email_Group_Papers_GOV__c) <> TEXT($Record__Prior.Email_Group_Papers_GOV__c), "Papers_GOV changed to '" & TEXT($Record.Email_Group_Papers_GOV__c) & "'." & BR(), "" ) & IF(TEXT($Record.Email_Group_Papers_GT__c) <> TEXT($Record__Prior.Email_Group_Papers_GT__c), "Papers_GT changed to '" & TEXT($Record.Email_Group_Papers_GT__c) & "'." & BR(), "" ) & IF(TEXT($Record.Email_Group_Promo_CDE__c) <> TEXT($Record__Prior.Email_Group_Promo_CDE__c), "Promo_CDE changed to '" & TEXT($Record.Email_Group_Promo_CDE__c) & "'." & BR(), "" ) & IF(TEXT($Record.Email_Group_Promo_EM__c) <> TEXT($Record__Prior.Email_Group_Promo_EM__c), "Promo_EM changed to '" & TEXT($Record.Email_Group_Promo_EM__c) & "'." & BR(), "" ) & IF(TEXT($Record.Email_Group_Promo_GOV__c) <> TEXT($Record__Prior.Email_Group_Promo_GOV__c), "Promo_GOV changed to '" & TEXT($Record.Email_Group_Promo_GOV__c) & "'." & BR(), "" ) & IF(TEXT($Record.Email_Group_Promo_GT__c) <> TEXT($Record__Prior.Email_Group_Promo_GT__c), "Promo_GT changed to '" & TEXT($Record.Email_Group_Promo_GT__c) & "'." & BR(), "" ) & IF(TEXT($Record.Email_Group_Promo_Partner_Opt_In__c) <> TEXT($Record__Prior.Email_Group_Promo_Partner_Opt_In__c), "Promo_Partner_Opt_In changed to '" & TEXT($Record.Email_Group_Promo_Partner_Opt_In__c) & "'." & BR(), "" )

formulas.name: FR_EG_ChangesText_WF3
formulas.expression: IF(TEXT($Record.Email_Group_Promo_TW__c) <> TEXT($Record__Prior.Email_Group_Promo_TW__c), "Promo_TW changed to '" & TEXT($Record.Email_Group_Promo_TW__c) & "'." & BR(), "" ) & IF(TEXT($Record.Email_Group_Surveys_GT__c) <> TEXT($Record__Prior.Email_Group_Surveys_GT__c), "Surveys_GT changed to '" & TEXT($Record.Email_Group_Surveys_GT__c) & "'." & BR(), "" ) & IF(TEXT($Record.Email_Group_News_CDE_Market_Insight__c) <> TEXT($Record__Prior.Email_Group_News_CDE_Market_Insight__c), "CDE_Market_Insight changed to '" & TEXT($Record.Email_Group_News_CDE_Market_Insight__c) & "'." & BR(), "" ) & IF(TEXT($Record.Email_Group_News_GOV_Market_Insight__c) <> TEXT($Record__Prior.Email_Group_News_GOV_Market_Insight__c), "GOV_Market_Insight changed to '" & TEXT($Record.Email_Group_News_GOV_Market_Insight__c) & "'." & BR(), "" ) & IF(TEXT($Record.Email_Group_News_GT_Market_Insight__c) <> TEXT($Record__Prior.Email_Group_News_GT_Market_Insight__c), "GT_Market_Insight changed to '" & TEXT($Record.Email_Group_News_GT_Market_Insight__c) & "'." & BR(), "" ) & IF(TEXT($Record.Email_Group_News_ER_SLED__c) <> TEXT($Record__Prior.Email_Group_News_ER_SLED__c), "News_ER_SLED changed to '" & TEXT($Record.Email_Group_News_ER_SLED__c) & "'." & BR(), "" ) & IF(TEXT($Record.Email_Group_News_GT_Biz__c) <> TEXT($Record__Prior.Email_Group_News_GT_Biz__c), "News_GT_Biz changed to '" & TEXT($Record.Email_Group_News_GT_Biz__c) & "'." & BR(), "" ) & IF(TEXT($Record.Email_Group_Awards_Digital_Counties__c) <> TEXT($Record__Prior.Email_Group_Awards_Digital_Counties__c), "Awards_Digital_Counties changed to '" & TEXT($Record.Email_Group_Awards_Digital_Counties__c) & "'." & BR(), "" ) & IF(TEXT($Record.Email_Group_Awards_Digital_Cities__c) <> TEXT($Record__Prior.Email_Group_Awards_Digital_Cities__c), "Awards_Digital_Cities changed to '" & TEXT($Record.Email_Group_Awards_Digital_Cities__c) & "'." & BR(), "" ) & IF(TEXT($Record.Email_Group_Awards_Govt_Exp__c) <> TEXT($Record__Prior.Email_Group_Awards_Govt_Exp__c), "Awards_Govt_Exp changed to '" & TEXT($Record.Email_Group_Awards_Govt_Exp__c) & "'." & BR(), "" ) & IF(TEXT($Record.Email_Group_Awards_Best_of__c) <> TEXT($Record__Prior.Email_Group_Awards_Best_of__c), "Awards_Best_of changed to '" & TEXT($Record.Email_Group_Awards_Best_of__c) & "'." & BR(), "" ) & IF(TEXT($Record.Email_Group_News_GT_AI__c) <> TEXT($Record__Prior.Email_Group_News_GT_AI__c), "News_GT_AI changed to '" & TEXT($Record.Email_Group_News_GT_AI__c) & "'." & BR(), "" ) & IF(TEXT($Record.Email_Group_News_GT_Cybersecurity__c) <> TEXT($Record__Prior.Email_Group_News_GT_Cybersecurity__c), "News_GT_Cybersecurity changed to '" & TEXT($Record.Email_Group_News_GT_Cybersecurity__c) & "'." & BR(), "" ) & IF($Record.HasOptedOutOfEmail <> $Record__Prior.HasOptedOutOfEmail, "Global Opt " & IF($Record.HasOptedOutOfEmail, "Out", "In") & "." & BR(), "" )

formulas.description: Detect a new global opt-out (FALSE â†’ TRUE)
formulas.name: FR_EG_OptOutNow

Flow.label: Contact - RT BS - Email Group Changes
